A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars the Last Jedi should change it’s name to Star Wars Escape of the Rebel’s. This movie was so disappointing\, I was so excited because I love the Star Wars movies. No questions where answered from the Force Awakens. Some people die for no apparent reason and nobody accomplishes anything! This movie was all about the rebels escaping getting cornered\, escaping and getting cornered again! This movie sucked so much! Not once did two lightsabers ever touch!! Luke literally didn’t do anything throughout the movie. And apparently Leía has godlike powers and can survive in the vacuum of space\, who knew that the Force can provide you with air in space. Snoke was more useless in this movie than he was in the Force Awakens and we still don’t know who he is. Kylo and Rey are now Skype buddies via the Force so there’s that. Way to ruin Star Wars for a fan who loved all 6 movies. Worst Star Wars movie ever.
